headline.main: BRITAIN DENIES CURB ON PRESS CRITICISMS; Bracken Tells Correspondents They May Report 'Good, Bad'

lead_paragraph: LONDON, March 31 -- Brendan Bracken, Information Minister, explained today the new censorship rules. The day after Mr. Bracken received a deputation representing the Association of American Correspondents in London, asking clarification of the new regulations, Mr. Bracken said:
abstract: Brit Information Min explains new Brit censorship rules
snippet: LONDON, March 31 -- Brendan Bracken, Information Minister, explained today the new censorship rules. The day after Mr. Bracken received a deputation representing the Association of American Correspondents in London, asking clarification of the new...

byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES
